wordpressPage.title: Wales
wordpressPage.content:
Summit Centre – South Wales – Website

The Summit Centre is a residential centre run by Rock UK who run several residential centres throughout the UK. The Summit Centre offers a range of residential options for youth groups with plenty of activities on offer. For full information check their website

Christian Mountain Centre – Llanbedr – Website

The Christian Mountain Centre offers a variety of residential options for a Welsh residential. There are a whole host of activities on offer too. For more information please contact the centre.

Ffaid-y-Brenin – Pembrokeshire – Website

Ffaid-y-Brenin is a Christian retreat centre set within glorious hills near the sea. The centre offers reasonably priced accommodation for residentials. Please contact the site for full information.

Bryn-y-groes Conference Centre – Snowdonia National Park – Website

A centre located in the Snowdonia National Park this centre can sleep 25 – 70 people and offers catering too. The centre has meetings room, a pool room, outside facilities (including football pitch) and is close to other local attractions. Please see their website for full information.

Cefn Lea Park – Dolfor, Wales – Website

This holiday centre has a range of options aimed at youth groups and other residentials including chalets, camping areas and a conference centre. For a bigger picture of their range of facilities, prices and local attractions please visit their website.

Min y Don – Gywnedd, Wales – Website

This centre offers a range of adventure options for schools, groups, families and individuals. For prices and more information please visit their website.

Kingswood Wales – Colomendy, North Wales – Website

The Kingswood centres can provide accommodation and activities for a variety of residentials and offer a host of programme options. See their website for full info.
